name: DAIRY PRODUCERS OF NEW MEXICO
firms: MILTNER LAW FIRM LLC (FKA MILTNER REED LLC)
sampleDescriptions: Lobbied in favor of expanding budgetary limitations on crop insurance coverage applicable to dairy production; ultimately included in HR 1892 (Bipartisan Budget Act of 2018).
Supported retention of Section 199A deductions as included in the Tax Cuts and Jobs Act of 2017 (codified at 26 USC 199a(g)).
Lobbied in support of Agricultural Guestworker Act (AG Act), HR 4092.

Supported consideration and passage of agricultural guest worker legislation, including Agricultural Guest Worker Act (HR 4092) and Securing America's Future Act (HR 4760) that would authorize a new a
